data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Jorhat with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jorhat, Assam, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Jorhat, Assam, India.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Jorhat, Assam, India find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the county of Jorhat against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Kaibartta people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Kaibartta people.
Father, make bold the prophets in Jorhat, Assam, India so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who are far from you in Jorhat. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.section_summary:
the county of Jorhat, Assam, India has a population of 153,900.

We estimate Jorhat has 1,693 people who might know Jesus, 1,867 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 150,340 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the county of Jorhat be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.
